name: portage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a place or route where a boat must be carried, especially over land between two areas of water: The courses have regular portages, in which a paddler must carry the kayak over dry land.
[ U ] the activity of carrying a boat, especially over land between two areas of water: a portage route

Transferring and transporting objects
to carry a boat, either over land between two areas of water or through the water: They had to get out of the canoe constantly because of the low water and had to portage several hundred yards at a time. You will have to portage your canoe and all your equipment.
